```json
{
  "summary": "A device-to-device memory synchronization feature that allows users to securely transfer encrypted local memory data between devices using QR codes for pairing and transfer.",
  "required_files": [
    "src/lib/memory/sync.ts",
    "src/lib/memory/export.ts",
    "src/lib/memory/import.ts",
    "src/lib/memory/conflict-resolver.ts",
    "src/lib/crypto/memory-encryption.ts",
    "src/components/QRGenerator.tsx",
    "src/components/QRScanner.tsx",
    "src/components/MemorySync.tsx",
    "src/routes/api/memory/export/+server.ts",
    "src/routes/api/memory/import/+server.ts",
    "src/types/memory-sync.ts"
  ],
  "dependencies": [
    "qrcode (QR generation)",
    "qr-scanner or jsqr (QR scanning)",
    "crypto-js or Web Crypto API (encryption)",
    "existing memory system",
    "device camera access permissions"
  ],
  "estimated_complexity": "high",
  "implementation_steps": [
    "1. Design memory export/import data structures and encryption schema",
    "2. Implement memory encryption/decryption utilities",
    "3. Create memory export functionality with data serialization",
    "4. Build QR code generation for encrypted memory packages",
    "5. Implement QR scanner component with camera access",
    "6. Create memory import and validation logic",
    "7. Design and implement conflict resolution algorithms (timestamp-based, user-choice, or merge strategies)",
    "8. Build API endpoints for export/import operations",
    "9. Create UI components for sync workflow",
    "10. Add error handling for network issues, encryption failures, and format mismatches",
    "11. Implement progress indicators for large memory transfers",
    "12. Add comprehensive testing for encryption, sync conflicts, and edge cases"
  ]
}
```
